tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Kavin Shah is the best dental surgeon for all your dental problems. He did impacted tooth removal for my kid,it was so gentle and pain-free.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had an excellent experience with Dr. Kavin Shah at Smile Sensations. He recommended a myofunctional appliance as the first step in my orthodontic treatment plan, which was the best decision. This unique approach set the foundation for my treatment, ensuring optimal results.

The transition to ceramic braces, another top-notch choice by Dr. Shah, was seamless. The discreet appearance of these braces was a huge plus, and I couldn't be happier with the results. Dr. Kavin Shah and his team at Smile Sensations truly offer the best in orthodontic care. I highly recommend their services!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Kavin and Dr Sonal are the most amazing doctors I have come across they are very calm with the patients 
Explain the issue properly and take good care like a mother to her child of their patients
I and my family are lifetime grateful to them

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Widely Spaced Teeth,Ceramic Dental Braces,Misaligned Teeth,
review: Dr. Kavin Shah is very professional and explains the problem, procedure and the time period to rectify in simple terms. He answers all your questions with patience and makes you feel at ease. Being at dentist's place isn't easy, but he makes it seem easy. He is also punctual and tries to maintain the appointment schedule respecting your time. The clinic charges are very reasonable for the quality of service, he will also give options between pricing and ease of payments with installment options as well. He is also accommodative and flexible in the appointment schedules. The staff is very helpful and always sends a reminder call for confirmation of the appointment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Kavin is very friendly and is an expert in his field. He knows what he is doing. He always greets his patients with a big smile and makes the entire process very smooth. The staff is also very friendly.

I was impressed by his subject knowledge. He follows due procedures and do his homework before suggesting a treatment for a issue.

I am very satisfied with my treatment. Also he always attends your call in case of any problem and addresses it promptly.

He discloses the entire treatment cost in the beginning and there are no hidden costs involved. 

The appointment process is also very efficient. One has to not wait for more than 15 mins.

I would strongly recommend Dr. Kavin for any braces related treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Soft spoken and expert in what he does. Satisfied with the services provided over 3 years of braces treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
